name: Chinatown Alleyway Tours Fast Track
description: Fast Track is a 9-session training program (4 hours each) that introduces participants to Asian American history through lectures, field trips, and skill-building workshops. It lays the foundation for those interested in becoming tour guides and sharing the Asian American experience.
fullDescription: Fast Track is a 9-session training program (4 hours each) that introduces participants to Asian American history through lectures, field trips, and skill-building workshops. It lays the foundation for those interested in becoming tour guides and sharing the Asian American experience.
